data.current_description: Generate a chart based on the provided parameters.
data.description_suggestion: Generates a chart image based on chart configuration parameters provided in the query string. Accepts parameters for chart type, data, labels, colors, and styling options. Returns the rendered chart as an image file. Use this endpoint when passing chart configuration via URL parameters.
